title: UCI Unleashes Monster Road Route for French 2027 ‘Mega Worlds’
content:
Cycle speedway, bike polo, and a reprisal of the iconic Sallanches road circuit to feature in the UCI 2027 combined format 'super world championships.'

Read the full article at UCI Unleashes Monster Road Route for French 2027 ‘Mega Worlds’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
